ValidationRule.description: This rule will fire when the record owner tries to update the record when the leave status is not pending or Approver 1 is pending.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(ISNEW()), OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(EMS_LM_Status__c), "Approver 2 Pending"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(EMS_LM_Status__c), "Cancelled"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(EMS_LM_Status__c), "Rejected"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(EMS_LM_Status__c), "Approved") ), EMS_LM_Contact__r.Id == $User.ContactId
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not edit the record
